title: Cafe Landwer
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, Pizza, International, Italian, Buffet, Mediterranean, Fast food, Salad bar, Delivery, Take-out, Catering, French, Israeli, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. In early 2016 the entire chain of Landwer cafes added even more vegan items to its menu. Choices include breakfast, sandwiches, main dishes, and more. Located inside Ice Mall.
